reviewText:
Excellent product!
Great training videos that will take you out of your comfort zone.
It has been a great blessing for our church and we re about to go out the preach the gospel in a very different way.
In a few months we will continue with Los Pasos del Maestro #2
I highly recommend this product!

This DVD is no longer being made.  I was able to find and purchase it here and I was not disappointed.  It gives practical advice on how,where, and when to "open air" preach as well as how to handle hecklers etc.  A must have for anyone with a burning desire to witness to the lost.  Just like Ray Comfort always says, "You can reach more lost people in one open air session than most pastors reach in a year.". Buy this DVD you won't be dissapointed!
